Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.gui.viewController

Class SelectStarterController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.client.gui.viewController.SelectStarterController
public class SelectStarterController extends Object
Controller class for handling the selection of starter card and objective cards in the GUI. Manages user interaction and updates based on game state changes.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(ClientState clientState, Controller controller)
      Initializes the controller with the current client state and controller instance. Sets the initial selected objective card and updates the view.
      Parameters:
      clientState - the current client state containing game information
      controller - the controller instance for executing game actions

    • updateview

      private void updateview(ClientState clientState)
      Updates the view with the provided client state. Updates the objective cards and starter card displayed in the GUI.
      Parameters:
      clientState - the updated client state to display

    • updateObjectiveCards

      private void updateObjectiveCards(ObjectiveCard[] objectiveCards)
      Updates the displayed objective cards with the provided objective cards.
      Parameters:
      objectiveCards - the array of objective cards to display

    • onObjectiveClick

      private void onObjectiveClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the click event on objective cards. Updates the selected objective card and highlights the corresponding rectangle.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event triggered by clicking on an objective card

    • updateStarterCard

      private void updateStarterCard(GameCard starterCard)
      Updates the displayed starter card with the provided starter card.
      Parameters:
      starterCard - the starter card to display

    • flipCard

      private void flipCard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Flips the starter card when clicked, toggling between front and back views.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event triggered by clicking on the starter card

    • getStarterCardId

      private int getStarterCardId()
      Retrieves the ID of the current starter card.
      Returns:
      the ID of the current starter card

    • onConfirmBtnClick

      private void onConfirmBtnClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the confirm button click event. Executes the player's initial choice action with the selected objective and starter card side.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by clicking on the confirm button

    • clearObjectiveCardBorders

      private void clearObjectiveCardBorders()
      Clears the selection border on the objective cards.

    • createShadow

      private void createShadow(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
      Creates a drop shadow effect for the provided ImageView.
      Parameters:
      imageView - the ImageView to apply the drop shadow effect

    • imgFrom

      private javafx.scene.image.Image imgFrom(int id, String side)
      Loads an Image from resources based on the provided card ID and side.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the card
      side - the side of the card ("front" or "back")
      Returns:
      the loaded Image object
